text:
It would be nice to have the version of the JMeter that was used to create (or update) a script in the jmx file.
For example, it could be saved as an attribute of the jmeterTestPlan tag: <jmeterTestPlan version="1.2" properties="2.2" jmeter:version="2.6">
creator: dimitris@watchmouse.com

text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 53673 ***
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
